title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.8 - Payrolls prepared by departments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 3.8 - Payrolls prepared by departments

State Regulations

Payrolls, other than those prepared by the Comptroller's
office, must be submitted to the Comptroller in duplicate (original and carbon
copy for payment). One copy of each such payroll must also be filed with the

Employees' Retirement System. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
3.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
